author: cutting
msg: Fix HADOOP-148.  Maintain a task failure count per tasktracker and display it in the web ui.  Contributed by Owen.

author: sebor
msg: (i64_t): Defined to int when _RWSTD_INT32_T is not #defined.

author: rickhall
msg: Found another issue in boot delegation when it comes to classes/resources
in the default package (i.e., no package name). For now, no delegation to
the parent class loader will occur if there is no package name.
Also, modified the diagnostics to use the same class loader for checking
the parent class loader as the one that is actually used for boot delegation.
